page.title: 10Local Interest
page.content:
Christow Rectory may be sold. The houses on the new estate by the school are all sold at last. A BMX club for the children has started. In October eight new council houses are to be built on Lain field. Christow School won the valley football cup and infant sports cup. Mr Rigby, head of school, retired. Also Mrs Hanley, caretaker of the school for 28 years. The third unit in the industrial estate started.
The plan to build a new village hall for Bridford rejected in favour of an extension to the existing one.
